name: Spidey Swing
description:
You love to swing - but you're a spider and need webs!! In Spidey Swing, touch and hold to launch your web to experience the fun of swinging from web to web...just like spider man! Eat worms for a turbo boost and flies for extra points... but watch out for bees!!!

Fans of tiny wings, angry birds, and other cute physics games will love Spidey Swing.
